net.myorb.math.matrices

Interface SimultaneousEquations.AugmentedMatrix<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - type of component values on which operations are to be executed
    All Superinterfaces:
    MatrixAccess<T>
    Enclosing class:
    SimultaneousEquations<T>

    public static interface SimultaneousEquations.AugmentedMatrix<T>
extends MatrixAccess<T>
    description of a matrix appended with an additional row

    • Method Summary

      update a row with a sum of rows and a scaling factor

      • scaleRow

        void scaleRow(int rowNumber,
              T scaleFactor)
        multiply elements of a row by a scaling factor
        Parameters:
        rowNumber - the row number to be updated
        scaleFactor - the factor to use

      • scaleAndAddToRow

        void scaleAndAddToRow(T scaleFactor,
                      int sourceRow,
                      int intoRow)
        update a row with a sum of rows and a scaling factor
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - the factor to use to scale the source row
        sourceRow - the row to use as a source to be scaled
        intoRow - the row number to be updated

      • swapRows

        void swapRows(int row1,
              int row2)
        exchange two rows of the matrix
        Parameters:
        row1 - the first of the row numbers
        row2 - the second of the rows
